metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18456 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - negligible
metadata.Description: The function Object::isName() in Object.h (called fromGfx::opSetFillColorN) in Xpdf 4.00 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (stack-based buffer over-read) via a crafted pdf file, asdemonstrated by pdftoppm.

criterions.comment: xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
